term.name: Organ and tissue donation and transplantation

bill.summary:
National Organ Transplant Act Amendments of 2018
This bill makes several changes to the organization and goals of the Organ Procurement and Transplantation Network, including expanding the scope to specifically address certain populations (e.g., minorities, children, and individuals who live in rural areas).
